Html:
How does Rawr determine the DPS increase of a piece of gear (as displayed on the Comparisons chart). without knowing what spell cycle you are intending to use?

I know there are certain typical cycles associated with particular specs, but it'd be great if there was a way to see what the default cycle being used by the calculations is. Maybe make it bold in the "Spell Info" list, or even better would be the option to select a cycle to use for comparison.
Mouse over the * next to "Spell Cycles: ".
